show_name: 3 Choume no Tama: Uchi no Tama Shirimasen ka?
other_title: San Choume no Tama Uchi no Tama Shirimasenka?
Sanchome no Tama: Uchi no Tama Shirimasenka?
3丁目のタマ うちのタマ知りませんか?
opening_theme: #1: "Ai wa Genki-desu. (愛は元気です。)" by Yumi Tanimura (eps 1-9)
#2: "Genki da Shite yo (元気だしてよ)" by Yumi Tanimura (eps 10-35)
ending_theme: #1: "Bokura wa Nakama da Tama Ondo (ボクらは仲間だタマ音頭)" by Hiroko Kasahara (eps 1-9)
#2: "Mitsu Ami Hippatte (みつあみ引っ張って)" by Yuuko Kumai (eps 10-35)
